summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the acquisition of real property located on 8th Avenue between Marion and Columbia Streets, otherwise known as Lot 4 Block 71, Terry's First Addition to the Town of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 1 of Plats, page 49, in King County, Washington and; authorizing acceptance and recording of the deed for open space, park, and recreation purposes; and authorizing acquisition by condemnation.
